author: cjodea
msg: * updated tests so that servers are launched once per TestCase
* servers are shutdown at process termination

author: andreasmyth
msg: Minor changes to configuration metadata schema.
Support for accessing type schema information at runtime.
Implementation of XML name to Java identifier algorithm in JAXBUtils class.
Configuration for Service components: currently only containing one item (handlerChain).
Initialisation of a Service's default HandlerResolver from configuration.
Also included some artefacts for possible future Spring integration - currently not used (i.e. no dependency on resp. targets).

author: eglynn
msg: updated NOTICE.source with cglib licensing details

author: dkulp
msg: Cleaned up a bunch of warnings shown in eclipse
Moved the clean targets from build.xml to their own include
Updated the in eclipse project "clean" to re-copy the resources for the tests so most of the tests will run from within eclipse.

author: cjodea
msg: revert back to state as at r176
